content:
GF#23896, US Core clarify how to make language available in Narrative

Options:

  1. Document as text in CapabilityStatement.rest.documentation
  2. new US Core Extension based on https://gforge.hl7.org/gf/project/fhir/tracker/?action=TrackerItemEdit&tracker_item_id=22694
  3. ?
I would vote for basing it on the outcome of the tracker
to clarify the tracker GF#22694 is for R5 we could 'backport ' it as an extension.

I don't know if we can wait for R5 release, but I think we should at least try to model the extension after the expected R5 functionality. At least, I don't think you can officially "backport" before the real release, since none of the generated extension URLs will be available, etc

I am discussing the logistics here: stream:fhir/infrastructure-wg topic:GF#22694

a standard extension for R4 is what I looking into and whether thats a possibility
so .... http://hl7.org/fhir/5.0/StructureDefinition/extension-CapablilityStatement.acceptLanguage assuming the will work off the CI build... still working out the details
